jld.title: Justia Elevate WordPress Engine Updates
description: As always, security is of utmost importance to us. Your WordPress engine was updated to the latest version. Check out the details in this post from WordPress.
description2: Your Yoast SEO plugin has received an upgrade to its latest version! Regular maintenance is key to ensuring optimal performance, and this update introduces various enhancements to improve user experience and search engine optimization. You can find more information on this upgrade here.
